short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Check a URL or an IP address on AbuseIPDB

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AbuseIPDB Check is a Chrome extension that allows users to quickly look up IP addresses or domain names on AbuseIPDB. With a simple right-click, users can select any text or link to verify its reputation on AbuseIPDB, helping them identify potentially malicious or unsafe addresses.

Key Features:

Right-click on selected text or links to perform an instant lookup on AbuseIPDB. Supports direct IP addresses and domain names for maximum flexibility. No data is collected or storedâ€”interactions are direct with AbuseIPDB.

This tool is ideal for cybersecurity professionals, network administrators, or anyone concerned with online security and safety. By streamlining the process of checking IPs and domains, AbuseIPDB Check helps users stay informed and protected from potential threats.
